documentation.text: @dev The Shyft Cache Graph address that this contract is bound to.
@dev The Trust Anchor Manager address that this contract is bound to.
@dev Initializes this contract with the owner set to the calling public address.

typeDescriptions.typeString: function (bytes memory,bytes memory,bytes memory,bytes32) pure returns (bool)

attributes.text: @dev The Shyft Cache Graph address that this contract is bound to.
@dev The Trust Anchor Manager address that this contract is bound to.
@dev Initializes this contract with the owner set to the calling public address.

attributes.type: function (bytes memory,bytes memory,bytes memory,bytes32) pure returns (bool)

devdoc.details: | A reference contract related to the Shyft Cache Graph's routing channels. | Especially useful if wanting to prove off-chain data (would need to be associated to the Shyft Bridge), in relation to offchain Trust Channels the user is associated to.

constructor.details: Initializes this contract with the owner set to the calling public address.

setShyftCacheGraphAddress(address).details: Links the Shyft Cache Graph to this contract's function flow.

params._shyftCacheGraphAddress: The smart contract address for the Shyft Cache Graph that should be linked.

returns.result: | false: [ will never return false due to require() ]    | true: shyft cache graph address set correctly

setTrustChannelManagerAddress(address).details: Links Trust Channel Manager to this contract's function flow.

params._trustChannelManagerAddress: The smart contract address for the Trust Channel Manager that should be linked.

returns.result: | false: [ will never return false due to require() ]    | true: trust channel manager address set correctly

shyftCacheGraphAddress.details: The Shyft Cache Graph address that this contract is bound to.

trustChannelManagerAddress.details: The Trust Anchor Manager address that this contract is bound to.
